nodes.text: The Terror Brigade was a group of illicit thrill-seekers composed of former Mandalorians, who settled on the planet Hoth during the Cold War. The Terror Brigade was responsible for capturing an Imperial Moff by the name of Yoren, whom they offered to turn over to the custody of the Galactic Republic if a Republic representative could survive a series of combat challenges.
The Terror Brigade appears in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as enemies in the Heroic mission "The Terror Brigade" on Hoth for Republic players.
